name: Kn.y.J type Parasite
description:
----ABOUT----

-Made for the Kenney Jam 2022 in 48 hours 

-You are a Kn.y.J type Parasite, otherwise know as (worm), and you have unwelcomed guests

----HOW-TO-PLAY----

-Move around using your mouse

-Press mouse left click to slow down

----GOAL----

-Eat as much and grow as big as you can before you die

----HELP----

-When the timer reaches zero you become an adult and can no longer grow bigger

-Green dudes give 100 points

-Blue dudes give 200 points

----CREDITS----

-Visual and sound assets were provided by - Kenney.nl

-Font - Dogica by Roberto Mocci 

----ABOUT-THE-DEVELOPMENT----

-This is my second ever game jam, and second ever public game

-Wanted to make some custom music but there wasn't enough time so i used very slowed down sound effect, because it seemed like good enough ambient music 

-There are some bugs but none are game breaking(nvm i found 2 (1st is running into a sword before its disabled, and 2nd is npcs climbing out of bounds using the stairs))

-The most annoying bug is the worms body parts not rotating like they are supposed to, it works like its supposed to separately, but not with the rest of the game >:(

-Was made using Godot
